entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] WBT failing to install with `Could not find IncludedWorkloadManifests.txt` because the file was renamed #86192
    8.0.0
  • Move ILLink.RoslynAnalyzer.Tests.Generator to be an IIncrementalGenerator-based source generator #86190
  • [Breaking Change] Change CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap to only unwrap wrappers from the target ComWrappers instance #86189
    8.0.0
  • ilcompiler: System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsSupported has already been added #86186
  • JIT: Fix test setting general JitStress #86185
    8.0.0
  • May 9 21:11:41 server883 kernel: [218937.760135] .NET Server GC[1427719]: segfault at 8 ip 00007f7440ae835c sp 00007f74395bfdf0 error 6 #86183
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.Abstractions' with .net 7.0.5 #86182
  • ICorProfilerCallback.AssemblyUnloadStarted is never called #86178
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Allow containment to reorder the same single exceptions #86173
    Future
  • [mono][hotreload] Add a property in a type #86172
    8.0.0
  • CI failure in the "banana" rid leg on Centos Stream 8 #86169
  • Minor cleanup of approved Avx512 API surface #86168
    8.0.0
  • [browser][debugger] chrome failing to start #86166
  • [wasm] blazor perf builds failing #86165
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Text.Json.Tests` AOT failing with v8, and chrome #86164
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Provide "single-file" deployment #86162
    Future
  • [CoreCLR] Implement support for `UnsafeAccesorAttribute` #86161
    8.0.0
  • GenerateReferenceSource workflow when adding new classes to System.Private.CoreLib #86160
    8.0.0
  • Maui - .Net iOS App Store rejection: App references non-public symbols #86156
  • Docker Container Build : (Cleanup Temporary Target Assembly target) -> C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Microsoft.WinFx.targets(480,10): error MSB3061: Unable to delete file obj\x86\Release\. Access to the path is denied #86153
  • [mono][interpreter] System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() does not show any callstack when running with interpreter enabled #86148
  • Memory leak after configuration disposal from PhysicalFileProvider #86146
  • Consider renaming COM* types in clr native code to CLR* #86145
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: An HTTP/2 connection could not be established because the server did not complete the HTTP/2 handshake #86142
  • When reflecting abstruct proterty in interface, "BadImageFormatException: Bad IL format" will be thrown. #86141
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #86134
    8.0.0

Closed

  • NRE in Networking Telemetry EventSources #77434
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Vector3 #85992
    8.0.0
  • The build instructions do not mention clr.dactools (soon nativeprereqs) #58328
    Future
  • Official build fails due to missing windows_arm job #86073
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: Ensure native linux hosted asmdiffs work #86181
    Future
  • Native AOT Trimming & Perf Improvements in .NET 8 #79003
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: Spurious diffs when stressing profiler ELT callbacks #82164
    Future
  • SPMI: Native Linux-hosted throughput runs #85749
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 5/1/2023 6:56:14 PM #85986
    8.0.0
  • CentOS 8-based source-build legs failing in CI #86124
  • Remove libraries folders that don't have src/*.cs files #78978
    Future
  • Wasm perf runs are completely broken due to recent changes #86001
  • Question about instruction groups #86117
  • Remove old multi-dimensional array code #71678
    8.0.0
  • Consider passing `enregisterLocalVars` as a template argument to LinearScan #82848
    8.0.0
  • When reflecting abstruct proterty in interface, "BadImageFormatException: Bad IL format" will be thrown. #86140
  • Performance regression observed for RSA.ImportParameters in Ubuntu when upgrading from .Net Core 3.1 to .Net 6 #84760
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64147
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Adopt Microsoft.DotNet.XunitAssert fork #86193
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] InstallWorkloadFromArtifacts: remove unnecessary workaround #86191
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enable Vector64 support on arm64 in jit mode. #86188
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Specify NUnit test runner for illink tests #86187
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • GetChromeVersions task: Try to find older versions, if the latest one is #86184
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix EventPipe shutdown logic #86180
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete the verification type system #86179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add marshallers for GeneratedComInterface-based types #86177
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Isolating JITDbl2Ulng helper changes #86175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use /INCREMENTAL:NO for Debug #86170
    needs-area-label
  • avoid ProtocolToken allocations in TLS handshake #86163
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • JIT: do early block merging in more cases #86157
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix lint issues #86155
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Run fgValueNumberConstLoad for invariant loads #86154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] introduce sourcemaps #86152
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • add pre-built detection #86151
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Always expand cctor helpers for NAOT #86147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add fp <--> int conversions to PackedSimd #86143
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Enable PackedSimd in the interpreter; interpreter/jiterpreter v128 bug fixes #86136
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Avoid NRE in networking EventSources #86171
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Make the STJ source generator cache friendly #86121
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix the test build error #86176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update debugging-runtime.md to mention nativeprereqs #86174
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix spurious SuperPMI asm diffs #86132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Write generic method, write complex signatures like array/pointer/generics #86026
    area-System.Reflection
  • Convert JIT/Performance to a merged test group #85851
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for RUC warnings on override methods #86015
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use unique IL assembly names instead of automatic renaming #85185
    test-enhancement
  • [browser] improve CSP #86158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT/SIMD to a merged test group #85852
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/opt to a merged test group #85850
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Generics to a merged test group #85849
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Unify boot config location #85763
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix official build of cross DAC components #86138
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove unused multi-dimensional array code #86133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix createdump --crashreport option error #86137
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Reorder urllib and remove --force-reinstall but keep pinned version #86128
    area-Infrastructure
  • Tweak new OutOfMemory_StringTooLong exception message #86150
    needs-area-label
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Expose remaining Avx512 integer intrinsics which don't require VectorMask #86130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0-staging] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85784
    Servicing-approved, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix emitOutputInstr #86078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete more code around reflection blocking #86139
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove last `!` from Caching.Abstractions #85918
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update portable linux source-build legs to use AlmaLinux to better represent building on RHEL8 #86114
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an SSA bug from the `ASG` refactoring #86108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add a pass of liveness for the new locals inside physical promotion #86043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Clean up impSpanEqualsOrStartsWith #86129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Vector<T> fallbacks for Vector128<T> #85916
    area-System.Memory
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Show method names in JitDisasm #86060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Load appsettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    blocked, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Added float32 support and implemented all R4 opcodes #86092
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade gcc CI to use gcc13 #86051
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
